entry.title: Combined summary - Hello every ones ! A message from an unknown traveller.
entry.summary: On November 15th, 2017, Matt Corallo responded to an email from Satoshi Nakamoto on the Lightning development mailing list. Nakamoto's original email, sent a day earlier, discussed the importance of being optimistic and planning ahead strategically in cryptocurrency development, specifically in relation to Bitcoin's Lightning Network. He also encouraged individuals to be kind to each other when faced with negative criticism. The conversation takes a lighthearted turn with the mention of hair color-related hard forks that lack consensus. Despite this, there is a clear emphasis on valuing creativity and individuality in the approach to Bitcoin development, as seen in the use of quirky language like "keep Bitcoin weird".
